name: The BHW Group
tagline: Web and mobile apps for businesses of all sizes
description:
The BHW Group is a turn-key digital product agency that specializes in mobile and web app design and development. Over the past thirteen years, we have built numerous award winning applications, including a 2015 SXSW Innovation Awards Finalist, a 2014 National Association of Government Communications first place winner, and 2017 Golden Stevie. We have been selected as one of the best places to work in Austin each of the past three years, by the Austin Business Journal.
We have worked with over 75 clients to create over 375 web and mobile apps. Over 80% of our clients have worked with us on multiple projects or for multiples years.
